pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyPlots[![Build status](https://github.com/jakkes/pyplots/actions/workflows/python-app.yml/badge.svg?branch=main)](https://github.com/jakkes/pyplots/actions/workflows/python-app.yml)Wraps matplotlib into easier plotting utilities. ## Installation```pip install pyplots```## Documentationhttps://jakkes.github.io/pyplots/## Exampleshttps://github.com/jakkes/pyplots/tree/main/examples
